page.title: 11A TYPICAL WEEKEND
page.content: {1 On Saturday}morning I looked at the clock-9.45. Ah! stay in bed for another hour. 2 minutes later mum said "Get out of bed". I went into my brothers room. He was asleep.I put his hamster on his face and he woke up! We both made our beds and tidied our rooms. We went down stairs to find our breakfast waiting for us. I watched "Saturday Morning Picture Show" then I watched "Freeze Frame". {2 On Sunday}I get up between 10 & 11am I go to Martins at about 12.15pm and just get there before they close.We have roast dinner at about 1pm.I help to wash & dry the dishes with my Dad. Usually we lounge about all day and at 3pm I do some cooking. I make cakes and rock buns. At 5pm we get tea ready and I muck around until 8.45,watching T.V.and getting my bag ready for school.
